abstract: The company increased its profit outlook for the year as its first-quarter revenue rose. Net income, however, fell 13 percent after a shift in the company’s pension plan.
snippet: The company increased its profit outlook for the year as its first-quarter revenue rose. Net income, however, fell 13 percent after a shift in the company’s pension plan.
lead_paragraph: Boeing said on Wednesday that its core operating earnings rose 12 percent in the first quarter, beating analysts’ expectations as the company continued to capitalize on the demand for new passenger planes.
